It's an ok restaurant.  Nothing super special about it, but the location is beautiful!  It is located in a square in front of a church.  It encompasses the idea of what lunch in Barcelona should be like.  Unfortunately there are a lot of shady characters that are looking for any opportunity to distract you and take anything you leave unprotected (phones, cameras, bags, etc.) so be careful if you decide to sit on the terrace (and I do suggest sitting on the terrace when the weather is nice).
